data.name: Bruna Santos
data.aboutMe: A dedicated engineering student with a strong foundation in QA, seeking a summer internship as a Junior Web Developer at Confledis. Offering recent experience in frontend development and a passion for building innovative digital platforms.

education.institution: Institut Supérieur de Mécanique de Paris (ISAE-Supméca)

education.degree: Test Automation, Information and Communication Technology Extension

experience.title: BRAFITEC Scholarship Awardee
description: Student of BRAFITEC (BRAsil France Ingénieur TECnologia) exchange program, developed in the scope of cooperation between Brazil and France governments.
Financed by the Brazilian Coordination for the Improvement of Higher Education Personnel (CAPES), which offers scholarships to about 200 students who have excelled in Brazilian engineering programs.

experience.title: Project Researcher
description: Researched and developed a Bayesian Network model to create risk assessment analysis of an energy prediction tool (ENERMAN).
Used Python, especially pgmpy and matplotlib libraries, to build a bow-tie model for risk analysis.

experience.title: Quality Assurance Engineer
description: Developed English communication skills in an international environment with a global team.
Created and executed test plans for functional and non-functional manual tests.
Created UI automated tests using Swift language and XCUITest framework on iOS devices.

experience.title: Software Test Engineer
description: Full-time Test Engineer from April 2021 to July 2021
Executed manual test cycles with regression and exploratory functional tests.
Execution and maintenance of automated test scripts for Android using Java and UIAutomator.
Investigation and tracking of issues, opening change requests (CR's), and retests with JIRA.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: This is my portfolio, where I showcase my latest projects and experience. It was a project made to review the concepts of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that I have learned so far, starting from a design by bludDev.

projects.title: Alura Books
projects.description: This is Alura Books, a project to put the mobile-first approach into practice and apply responsive design concepts.

projects.title: Alura Plus
projects.description: This is Alura Plus, my first HTML + CSS project.

projects.title: Alura Books API
projects.description: This is the Alura Books API, a project to practice JavaScript by utilizing APIs and methods such as filter, map, reduce, etc.
